title: Essential’s unreleased smart display shows up on eBay
content:
Andy Rubin’s tech startup Essential only ever released one product before collapsing, the Essential Phone PH-1, but the company had grand ambitions for other devices. The ‘Essential Home’ was planned as something like today’s smart displays, and now a supposed prototype has appeared on eBay. The prototype, which is being sold for $900 on eBay

The post Essential’s unreleased smart display shows up on eBay appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Andy Rubin’s tech startup Essential only ever released one product before collapsing, the Essential Phone PH-1, but the company had grand ambitions for other devices. The ‘Essential Home’ was planned as something like today’s smart displays, and now a supposed prototype has appeared on eBay. The prototype, which is being sold for $900 on eBay
